title: River of steel
creator_credit: W H Larkin Cartoon Studio, Film Producers Guild and Peter Sachs
brief_description: A short cartoon summary of steel making followed by a humorous glimpse of a world suddenly deprived of its steel. A rhyming commentary guides through the processing of the steel, which is conveyed pictorially by bold attempts to combine the utilitarian approach of the drawing office and the artistic licence of the abstract painter.
